DDL:
CREATE TABLE Bowler_Scores (
    MatchID INT,
    GameNumber smallint,
    BowlerID INT,
    RawScore smallint,
    HandiCapScore smallint,
    WonGame BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE Bowler_Scores_Archive (
    MatchID INT,
    GameNumber smallint,
    BowlerID INT,
    RawScore smallint,
    HandiCapScore smallint,
    WonGame BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE Bowlers (
    BowlerID INTEGER,
    BowlerLastName TEXT,
    BowlerFirstName TEXT,
    BowlerMiddleInit TEXT,
    BowlerAddress TEXT,
    BowlerCity TEXT,
    BowlerState TEXT,
    BowlerZip TEXT,
    BowlerPhoneNumber TEXT,
    TeamID INT,
    BowlerTotalPins INT,
    BowlerGamesBowled INT,
    BowlerCurrentAverage smallint,
    BowlerCurrentHcp smallint
);

CREATE TABLE Tourney_Matches (
    MatchID INTEGER,
    TourneyID INT,
    Lanes TEXT,
    OddLaneTeamID INT,
    EvenLaneTeamID INT
);

CREATE TABLE Tourney_Matches_Archive (
    MatchID INT,
    TourneyID INT,
    Lanes TEXT,
    OddLaneTeamID INT,
    EvenLaneTeamID INT
);
